Summary: Black ball hovering over my house then once i saw it it moved off very slowly picking up speed no noise an had a heat wave around it
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back garden having a cigarette jets had been in the area all morning so was looking around to see if I could see them I could only hear them then I turned round looked up and there was a black ball hovering over the house it seemed that as soon as I noticed it it started to move off slowly in an easterly direction picking up pace as it went turning in a very strange way somthing I can't explain it made no noise but as it started to move off it had almost like an energy around it I can only describe it like a heat wave all around it I have never seen somthing so blatent in all my life I felt like I had to do somthing as my heart is still racing from what I've seen as I know this is not a man made object I can't be
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fenstanton
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
